entities.name: flint
entities.description: Flint is a person who is involved in a Quidditch match and gets hit by Fred Weasley's Beater's club. He bleeds from his nose.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is a person who hits Flint with his Beater's club, causing him to bleed.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is a person who intervenes in the Quidditch match and gives penalty shots to both Gryffindor and Slytherin.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is a person who takes the penalty shot for Gryffindor and successfully beats the keeper.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is a person who cheers on Alicia during her penalty shot.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is the team that gets a penalty shot due to Flint's unprovoked attack on their Chaser.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is the team that gets a penalty shot due to deliberate damage to their Chaser.

relationships.description: Fred Weasley hits Flint with his Beater's club, causing him to bleed.
Madam Hooch gives a penalty shot to Gryffindor due to Flint's unprovoked attack on their Chaser.
Madam Hooch gives a penalty shot to Slytherin due to deliberate damage to their Chaser.
Alicia represents Gryffindor during the penalty shot and successfully beats the keeper.
Lee cheers on Alicia during her penalty shot.
